mapper.insert: insert into member (mid, name, birthdate, pass, email1, email2, joindate, mstatus, admin) values (#{mid}, #{name}, #{birthdate}, #{pass}, #{email1}, #{email2}, now(), 'Y', 'N')
insert into mdetail (mno, tel1, tel2, tel3, zipcode, addr1, addr2, balance, withdrawal) values (#{mno}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, '0', '9999-12-31 23:59:59.999999')
